verses.verse: And when <WG3753> they came <WG1448> near to Jerusalem, <WG2419> to Bethphage <WG967> and Bethany, <WG963> at <WG4314> the mount <WG3735> of Olives, <WG1636> he sends <WG649> forth <WG1614> two <WG1417> of his disciples, <WG3101>
